name: Traffic Rider - Highway Moto Racer & Motor Bike Racing Games (Free)
name_original: Traffic Rider - Highway Moto Racer & Motor Bike Racing Games (Free)
description:
Traffic Racer is an action packed COMBAT RACER with STUNNING VISUALS and more than 10 HOURS of Motors, GUNS and EXPLOSIVE FUN.

Race against incredible boss motor drivers. Upgrade and level up you cars and guns in a thrilling single player career mode or compete with other racers! Lock & load and enter the Traffic Racer, humiliate and destroy your opponents or sabotage the race. You choose how you win, NO TRICK IS TOO DIRTY!

LOAD YOUR GUNS and MISSLES, START YOUR ENGINES... It will blow you away, LITERALLY! This is no Sunday Drive. This is DEATH RALLY.

▸ Massive single player career mode, unlock and upgrade cars, weapons and race tracks.
▸ A number of control and camera options, and also support for physical controllers.
▸ Runs silky smooth 60fps even on the high resolution Retina display devices
▸ Real motor sounds recorded from real bikes

• • • IMPORTANT • • •
Traffic Racer should only be run on iOS 8 or later!
All older versions are not locked, but the optimal experience is not guaranteed below version 8.
